channel.title: Updated WoodwardWeb
channel.description: To celebrate my 5 year anniversary of blogging, I gave this site a long overdue refresh over the weekend. While I've been publishing stuff on the Woodwardweb.com domain since 1999, that was initially just putting pages up with notepad and...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Anthony Borton+00:00
item.description:
Hi Martin. The refresh to your blog looks great and I love the cartoon image of you :)
Cheers Anthony
item.dc:creator: Anthony Borton

item.title: Comment by Steven St Jean+00:00
item.description:
Very nice update. Very crisp and clean. I'm thinking that you need to ask the marketing folks to do an Anime or Manga version that you could rotate through randomly upon access. ;-)
- Steve
item.dc:creator: Steven St Jean

item.title: Comment by Martin Woodward+00:00
item.description: If you wait long enough, I wink...
item.dc:creator: Martin Woodward
